name: Before You Realize
description:
Here is a student project realized during the first year at the ETPA of Montpellier.

Story

The storyline follows a bounty hunter seeking revenge after his father was murder. To do so he tracks the killer down in order to kill him.

Controls

Free movement (D to go left, Q to go right).

Jump (SPACE to jump).

Use eapon(left mouse click to attack).

Change weapon (scroll mouse wheel)

Parry (E for parry).

Source code : https://github.com/Damien-Senechal/phaser3platformertuto
